kosmomod24:RedGiant.NAME: Red Giant
kosmomod24:RedGiant.FLAVOR: A dying star, swollen with unstable power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card and Exhaust 1 card in your hand.

kosmomod24:Blackhole.NAME: Blackhole
kosmomod24:Blackhole.FLAVOR: You can use it to eat your garbage.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat and every 2 turns, draw 2 additional cards and you may Exhaust 1 card in your hand.
